attributes.action: Provide a good even mobile phone coverage no matter what network across Norfolk.
attributes.background: Having tried several mobile networks over the years I found that non of our providers can supply a consistant phone signal across Norfolk, yet we are now being told about 5G most of us bearly get signal for a call or text or 2G. Our phones are for our safety and with no signal we are not safe.

rejection.details: We could accept a petition that asked the UK Government to impose minimum standards for UK mobile network providers to meet.
